mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room_info WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND room_status != 0
SELECT * FROM room_info ORDER BY room_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info (category_id, room_no, area, bed_type, price, facilities, cover_img, detail_imgs, room_status, create_time, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{roomNo}, #{area}, #{bedType}, #{price}, #{facilities}, #{coverImg}, #{detailImgs}, #{roomStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE room_info SET category_id = #{categoryId}, room_no = #{roomNo}, area = #{area}, bed_type = #{bedType}, price = #{price}, facilities = #{facilities}, cover_img = #{coverImg}, detail_imgs = #{detailImgs}, room_status = #{roomStatus}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
